page.title: 11CRUDWELL PLAYING FIELD
page.content: About 10 years ago the people of Crudwell decided to make a{playing {field for the children}of the village. It is about 2 acres in size and is found on Tetbury Lane.There are {plenty of amusements}available to help children pass the time including;two little{swings}and four big ones.There is a tall{slide}and a {rocking horse.}Children can also run and climb on the large logs and pipes lying around. There is a{football {pitch and a cricket pitch}in the middle of it. Oaksey Youth teams play here.In one corner of the field is a hut for the players to change in.Lots of events have been held in the playing field including the{donkey {derby}and the{WI cricket match.}
